title: VP of Operations
description: Served as Vice President of Operations for a college enterprise comprising 70+ students, worked to push the value and scope of projects the enterprise could deliver.
details:
Led general assembly sessions, instructing on documentation processes, tools development, and programming in
C# and Unity.
Directly supervised two student development teams and assessed their project deliverables.
Taught risk-assessment strategies, such as the pre-post mortem.

Headed a dedicated team, overseeing documentation, conducting team meetings, facilitating weekly check-ins,
and mentoring new students.
